page.title: 03Employment at Cynheidre.
page.content: Cynheidre Colliery is the largest employer in the Gwendraeth Valley. 1,100 miners are employed here apart from clerical staff and managerial personnel.The workforce come from a radius of fifteen miles.Buses are provided free for the workers.There are showers for the miners and also a good canteen providing reasonably priced meals. Of the 1,100 miners 1,000 work underground and the rest are in the washeries and various other occupations on the surface. Cynheidre Colliery was involved in a nationwide strike from March 12th 1984 to March 5th 1985.The workforce is now working normally.Labour relations are good.
